name: The Island (itch) (School for Games)
description:
"The Island" is a survival sandbox Multiplayer game. 

Play alone, or gather up to three friends and explore "The Island". Gather resources to build your house and find a source of food and water to stay alive. After a time, you will be attacked by Enemies during the night. Survive them and find a way of "The Island".

This game is a Unreal Engine 5.1 project by two Level Design- and two Programmer-students of School 4 Games Berlin:

Bastian S. - Lead Level Designer, Production, Game Design

Eric B. - Level Design, Production, Game Design

Martin Z. - Lead Programmer, System Programmer

Rene H. - Gameplay/AI Programmer
